## VerificationParams type

Params for verification of auth circuit public signals

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type VerificationParams = {
    key: Uint8Array;
    verificationFn: VerificationHandlerFunc;
};
```
**References:** [VerificationHandlerFunc](./js-sdk.verificationhandlerfunc.md)
